channel.title: FM Multiball Neighborhood Madness (D2)
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Timer http://itsalmo.st
### Rules
Standard rules apply as in FoL: No gamethrowing No cheating ect..
### Gameplay
Actions are done by messaging me When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it Days will last 48 Hours and Nights will last 24 hours Neighborhoods will facilitated by DM groups on the forums and can talk at all times If you are converted by a vampire or a werewolf you will keep your ability's There is no scum chat and scum are not informed of who the others are The game is multiball and each faction will need to eliminate each other and the town If you are roleblocked you will not lose any uses of your ability's If 2 people roleblock eachother then nothing will happen to either of them and both of them will be told they were roleblocked If someone already in a Neighborhood chat is Neighborized then the Neighborhoods will merge.
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When the day ends the person with the most votes dies. If the majority of people vote no Lynch then no one dies. Executions end the Day
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone roleblocked you You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Class cards >## [color=brown]Tough Werewolf[/color] > * You are Immune to death once by vigilante and vampire attacks. If you are attacked twice in the same night or by a Werewolf then you will die anyways > * Once per game you can convert target player into a werewolf and roleblock them. You will be given a neighborhood chat together even if the conversion failed. You cannot convert a Vigilante or a Vampire. > >Goal: Eliminate the Town and Vampires
> ## **[color=brown]Vicious Werewolf[/color]** > * Once per game you can attack a player at night. > * Once per game you can convert target player into a werewolf and roleblock them. You will be given a neighborhood chat together even if the conversion failed. You cannot convert a Vigilante or a Vampire. > >Goal: Eliminate the Town and Vampires
>## [color=gray]Tough Vampire[/color] > * You are Immune to death once by vigilante and werewolf attacks. If you are attacked twice in the same night or by a vampire then you will die anyways > * Once per game you can convert target player into a vampire and roleblock them. You will be given a neighborhood chat together even if the conversion failed. You cannot convert a Vigilante or a Werewolf. > >Goal: Eliminate the Town and Werewolves
> ## **[color=gray]Vicious Vampire[/color]** > * Once per game you can attack a player at night. > * Once per game you can convert target player into a Vampire and roleblock them. You will be given a neighborhood chat together even if the conversion failed. You cannot convert a Vigilante or a Werewolf. > >Goal: Eliminate the Town and Werewolves
> ## **[color=green]Bulletproof[/color]** > * You are immune to vampire and werewolf attacks once. If you are attacked twice in the same night or attacked by a vigilante you will die anyway. > > Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Vampires
> ## **[color=green]Monk Neighborizer[/color]** > * Once per game you may invite someone into your neighborhood and roleblock them. If they are a Vampire you will convert them to a Monk of your faction > >Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Vampires
> ## **[color=green]Mason Neighborizer[/color]** > * Once per game you may invite someone into your neighborhood and roleblock them. If they are a Werewolf you will convert them to a Mason of your faction > >Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Vampires
> ## **[color=green]Cop[/color]** >* Once per game you may check someone's alignment > > Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Vampires
> ## **[color=green]Unconvertable Vigilante[/color]** > * Twice per game you may Kill a player at night >* You are immune to Vampire and Werewolf conversion > > Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Vampires
### Rolelist: **[color=brown]Tough Werewolf[/color]** **[color=brown]Vicious Werewolf[/color]** **[color=gray]Tough Vampire[/color]** **[color=gray]Vicious Vampire[/color]** **[color=green]Bulletproof[/color]** **[color=green]Bulletproof[/color]** **[color=green]Monk Neighborizer[/color]** **[color=green]Mason Neighborizer[/color]** **[color=green]Cop[/color]** **[color=green]Cop[/color]** **[color=green]Unconvertable Vigilante[/color]** **[color=green]Unconvertable Vigilante[/color]**
Players: 1. @Marluxion 2. @Joshnniuq 3. @PokemonKidRyan 4. @Simon 5. @Hippolytus 6. @3DT_CheesyKnives 7. @Wolfy 8. @SuperJack 9. @Ami - Dead Cop 10. @Strangle 11. Frostwolf 12. Commissar
